overview: Feature film directed by Tang Huada and Yu Benzheng, starring Wu Haiyan and Ding Jiayuan. The film tells the story of actors from the film studio who went to live on the Yangtze River passenger ship, "Chaoyun," and hear a story about the joys and sorrows of brothers and sisters with different surnames that happened in the Three Gorges.
title: When the Mountains Are Full of Red Leaves
